Το παρόν πιστοποιητικό δεν αποτελεί ταξιδιωτικό έγγραφο. Τα επιστημονικά στοιχεία σχετικά με τον εμβολιασμό, το διαγνωστικό έλεγχο και την ανάρρωση από COVID-19 συνεχίζουν να εξελίσσονται, λαμβάνοντας επίσης υπόψη νέες παραλλαγές του ιού. Πριν ταξιδέψετε, ελέγξτε τα ισχύοντα μέτρα δημόσιας υγείας και τους σχετικούς περιορισμούς που εφαρμόζονται στον προορισμό σας.

Advances

Certificate of Attendance 
Awarded to 
Mr. FILIPPAKIS PAVLOS-ANGELOS 
For successfully completing the course 
“INDUCTION TRAINING SEMINAR ON BASIC MAINTENANCE & PROPER USAGE OF DRÄGER X-AM 5600 / 7000 / 8000, BASED ON TOTAL CARE PROCEDURES.” 
The training course was held on March 2022 at Poseidon Marine Supplies Training Center and included: 
• 
Overview of «CC Vision Basic» calibration software for annual calibration / certification 
• 
Manual calibration procedure for X-am 5600 / 7000 / 8000 
• 
Function (Bump) test procedure 
• 
Fresh air calibration 
• 
Identification of error messages and handling of alarms 
• 
Intended use and technical specifications 
The training course had theoretical and practical instructions. The participant was given the opportunity to learn the specific knowledge and handling, which are necessary to fulfill the maintenance at the above mentioned devices according to Total Care procedures, on his own responsibility. 
The training for Total Care program is

KATRADIS MARINE ROPES INDUSTRY S.A

has successfully attended the remote seminar regarding: 
Types of mooring ropes, Siri High Performance ropes, Synthetic mooring ropes / tails. Management, maintenance, inspection practices course according to OCIMF MEG4 (Mooring Equipment Guidelines 4th edition). 
Conducted remotely by KATRADIS on 16 March 2023
